Content.Text: (no translation)
Today's a festival day. The guild is closed.
The guild is closed on this day of the week.

It's outside of business hours. The guild is
closed.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Welcome to the guild.
<PAGE>
We handle the various day-to-day duties of
running the town here.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Welcome to the guild.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Welcome to the guild.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
We're still setting up at the moment. Please
come back later.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
How may I help you?
Rent a Public Field
Go to the Safari
Decide on Wedding Plan
Multiplayer Options

<CANCEL_SELECT>
I'm good, actually

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You would like to go to the Safari? As you wish.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You would like to go to the Safari? As you wish.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I'm sorry. Agate isn't feeling well today, so no
one is available to take you to the Safari.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Will you take any of your animals with you?
I'm taking farm animals.
Just myself.
I'm taking my family.

<CANCEL_SELECT>
On second thought, I'm not going.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I see. Please feel free to come again at another,
more convenient time.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I see. Please feel free to come again at another,
more convenient time.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You would like to go by yourself? Very good.
That will be <BLUE>100</BLUE>G.
Pay

<CANCEL_SELECT>
Never mind

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You would like to take your family? Very good.
That will be <BLUE><MOJI0></BLUE>G.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I'm sorry. We're unable to take you to the Safari
without receiving proper payment.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I'm sorry. It seems you don't have enough
money. I'm afraid we won't be able to take you
to the Safari.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Very good. Please choose which animals you
would like to take with you. You may take up to
16.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You will be taking <MOJI1>
animals with you? Very good. That will be
<BLUE><MOJI0></BLUE>G.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Thank you. Agate will be here in a moment to
show you the way.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Thank you. Agate will be here in a moment to
show you the way.

Sorry to keep you waiting! I'm ○○○○, the
ranger. Let's get going, shall we?

Sorry to keep you waiting! I'm ○○○○, the
ranger. Let's get going, shall we?

Here we are! I hope you have a lot of fun.
Whenever you'd like to go home, just come talk
to me.

Here we are! I hope you have a lot of fun.
Whenever you'd like to go home, just come talk
to me.

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What's up?

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What's up, <NICKNAME>?
Return to Oak Tree Town

<CANCEL_SELECT>
Don't leave yet

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
So you want to go back to Oak Tree Town? Are
you sure?

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
So you want to go back to Oak Tree Town,
<NICKNAME>? Are you sure?
Yeah, I'm sure.

<CANCEL_SELECT>
On second thought...

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Okie-dokie! Let's head back then. Make sure you
don't forget anything!

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Okie-dokie! Let's head back then. Make sure you
don't forget anything!

I'm afraid we're out of time. We should go back
to Oak Tree Town.

I'm afraid we're out of time. We should go back
to Oak Tree Town.

I hope you had a good time! Feel free to call me
whenever you want to go back.

I hope you had a good time! Feel free to call me
whenever you want to go back.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Pardon me, but it seems one of your family
members is ill.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Don't worry, the guild will look after your child
while you're away at the Safari.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Ah, so you're going to choose your Wedding
Plan. Everyone gets only one of these in their
lifetime, so please do choose very carefully!

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Which Plan would you like?
Simple Plan
Deluxe Plan
Luxury Plan

<CANCEL_SELECT>
Let's choose later

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You'd rather not make your selection now?
<PAGE>
It's a very important event. Please take your time
and think it over very carefully. We'll wait until
you're ready.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What style of wedding would you like?
Western
Eastern

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The Simple Plan in the Western Style will come
to <BLUE><MOJI0></BLUE>G. Will this be acceptable?
Go with this plan.

<CANCEL_SELECT>
On second thought...

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The <MOJI1> in the <MOJI2> Style will come
to <BLUE><MOJI0></BLUE>G.
<PAGE>
Also, there will be gifts on the day of the
ceremony, so please ensure you have <BLUE><MOJI3></BLUE> stock
slots and <BLUE>1</BLUE> bag slot available.
<PAGE>
Will this be acceptable?

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I'm afraid you don't have enough money. Please
either reconsider your plan or come again once
you've saved more.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Very good. An excellent decision! We'll set the
ceremony for <RED><MOJI3> <MOJI4></RED>. Please make certain
you're ready by then.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
How may I help you?
StreetPass Settings
Accept Gift

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm afraid we don't have any gifts for you at this
time.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It seems you don't have enough space in your
bag right now, so I'm unable to present you with
any gifts.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Here is what we have for you.
Accept <MOJI0>?

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
We have <MOJI0> gifts remaining to give to you.
Please come back for them after you've freed up
adequate space in your bag.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Would you like to activate StreetPass?
Activate StreetPass

<CANCEL_SELECT>
Don't Activate

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
We will now activate StreetPass.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Activation is complete.
<PAGE>
Please be aware that your StreetPass will
continue to work even when you're not playing
the game.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Would you like to deactivate your StreetPass?

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Would you like to activate your StreetPass?
Yes

<CANCEL_SELECT>
No

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Your StreetPass is now <RED>activated</RED>.
<PAGE>
Please be aware that your StreetPass will
continue to work even when you're not playing
the game.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Your StreetPass is now <RED>deactivated</RED>.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I was unable to activate StreetPass.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I will now begin writing your StreetPass data...

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I was unable to write your StreetPass data.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
As you have not yet saved your game at least
once, I cannot change your current StreetPass
settings.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This Nintendo 3DS system cannot receive any
further StreetPass data.
<PAGE>
To activate StreetPass data for this title, you will
need to deactivate StreetPass for another.
<PAGE>
This can be done via the StreetPass
Management item under System Settings.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I see. Please come again.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I see. Please come again.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Okay, so our wedding's gonna be on <RED><MOJI3>
<MOJI4></RED>?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>Awesome! Let's make it the happiest wedding
ever! Man, I can hardly wait...

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Our wedding will be on <RED><MOJI3> <MOJI4></RED>, then?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>Well, I think we're about to be very busy. Just
leave all the preparations to me, though!

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
So the wedding's on <RED><MOJI3> <MOJI4></RED>?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>I guess I'd better get started cooking the
reception dinner, then. I'm going to make you
the best feast the world's ever seen!

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
So, it's official, then. Our wedding will be on
<RED><MOJI3> <MOJI4></RED>. I'm starting to feel a little nervous, I
must admit...
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>...Oh, no need for concern. I'll be fine! I'll make
certain I'm ready as can be by the day of the
ceremony.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The wedding's on <RED><MOJI3> <MOJI4></RED>, then? What's the
ceremony usually like in this town?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>Ahh, it doesn't matter. Wedding ceremonies are
happy occasions! That's universal. Same in any
country!

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
So, <RED><MOJI3> <MOJI4></RED> for the wedding, then? It still
doesn't quite feel real to me...
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>Well, I'll be sure to work with my flowers the day
of, and I'm sure that will be sufficient to calm
my nerves.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
So, the wedding is on <RED><MOJI3> <MOJI4></RED>?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>I know my wedding plans are absolutely
perfect...but just in case, I should re-check my
outfit coordination!

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
All right. <RED><MOJI3> <MOJI4></RED> for the wedding, then.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>I may look calm, but my heart is fit to jump out
of my chest right now. Goodness, I don't know
if I'll be able to sleep the night before...

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The wedding is <RED><MOJI3> <MOJI4></RED>?! Ohmigosh, i-it's
really happening! I'm starting to feel a little
faint...
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>...No. No! I-I'll be fine. This is nothing compared
to doing a live broadcast.
<PAGE>
...Because doing a live broadcast is way easier...

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, so there's going to be a wedding on
<RED><MOJI3> <MOJI4></RED>? That's great! Who's the lucky
couple?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>...Wait, it's us?! O-oh my gosh. I-I don't know if
I'm ready yet...
<PAGE>
...I... I need to breathe...
...D-don't worry, I'll be fine. I-I'll be calm for the
ceremony. Or...I'll try, at least...

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmm? What's happening, now?
<PAGE>
...Our wedding? <RED><MOJI3> <MOJI4></RED>?! Why so sudden?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>Goodness. If you've already paid for it, then I
guess there's no other choice. I'll just need to
make sure I'm ready!

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Our wedding is on <RED><MOJI3> <MOJI4></RED>? Wh-when did
you decide that?!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>O-okay. So what do I need to do to get ready?
I'm...totally in the dark, here...
<PAGE>
...Whew. Okay, deep breaths! I need to calm
down. I-I think I should be able to manage at
least that much by the day of the ceremony...
